name: Foot Chick
description:
A (not) too long time ago. There was a rule which prohibit birds to play football and do human things, this was a big issue to Crow who is a football fanatic.

Everything changed the day when a silly airplane copilot opened the gates of a cargo plane filled with football balls. Those started falling and Crow saw his opportunity. He was about to do the most incredible shots and amaze the other birds.
